News.Title: Emerald Tyre Acquires SA Rubber Engineering for ₹140 Cr
News.Summary: Emerald Tyre Manufacturers announces acquisition of SA Rubber Engineering for up to ₹140 million, marking a significant expansion move in the rubber and tyre manufacturing sector.

News.Title: Emerald Tyre Manufacturers: Stellar 90% Premium Listing, Hits 5% Upper Circuit
News.Summary: Emerald Tyre Manufacturers Ltd. debuted on NSE SME at Rs 180.5, a 90% premium over its IPO price of Rs 95. The stock further rallied to hit a 5% upper circuit at Rs 189.5. The IPO was oversubscribed 530.5 times, with strong demand from non-institutional investors.
